titleStmt.title: Day's descant on Dauids Psalmes: or A commentary vpon the Psalter, as it is vsually read throughout the yeere, at morning, and euening prayer And first, of the first eight Psalmes, appointed to be read, the first day of the moneth.
titleStmt.author: Day, John, 1566-1628.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield, and Iames Short, printers to the famous Vniuersitie,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
